nodes.text: Dardan was a male Human who worked as a weapons modifications merchant during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. During the war, he operated a stall in the Ambassador Commons' Alien Enclave Market of the city Voss-Ka on the planet Voss. Dardan wore gray clothing while at his stall. He had fair skin and black hair and eyes.

Dardan first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, an MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. In the game he serves as a Republic and Imperial heavy armor vendor on the planet Voss. His location is also marked on a map in Prima Games' Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide.
